charaepi_ch0196_00_fleurdelis/2301_1101_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking around
the beach area when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] saw Lysandre looking
out at the sea.
charaepi_ch0196_00_fleurdelis/2301_1201_: So it’s you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...

How does the view from here look to you?
I think it’s quite beautiful.
charaepi_ch0196_00_fleurdelis/2301_0401_: Yes, the world is beautiful...or rather, it should be.
charaepi_ch0196_00_fleurdelis/2301_0402_:
Is that so? Then remember this: The world is
beautiful...or rather, it should be.
charaepi_ch0196_00_fleurdelis/2301_1201_:
However, that ugly group Team Break has been 
a plague to this island, stealing things to exert
its power.

It is absolutely hideous! Even here, the world is
teeming with ugly fools.

And the world is quietly waiting to be devoured
by such filth.
A future like that isn’t beautiful at all!

It is for the sake of this world that we reduce the 
number of such fools. That is the only way.

Once Yveltal awakens its true power, it would
take no time at all to do that.
charaepi_ch0196_00_fleurdelis/2301_0301_: Yveltal, are you OK with that?!
charaepi_ch0196_00_fleurdelis/2301_0401_: Hmph. What else would you expect it to do?
charaepi_ch0196_00_fleurdelis/2301_0402_: Hmph. Reasoning with it won’t work.
charaepi_ch0196_00_fleurdelis/2301_1201_:
When Yveltal spreads its wings and tail feathers
and starts to glow, it will absorb every last bit of
life force from all living creatures!

If I so desire such destruction, even Yveltal
wouldn’t be able to resist that temptation. 
After all, we are a sync pair.
charaepi_ch0196_00_fleurdelis/2301_0301_: I won’t let you destroy the world!
charaepi_ch0196_00_fleurdelis/2301_0401_: Oh, really? So you’ll try to stop me?
charaepi_ch0196_00_fleurdelis/2301_0302_: I won’t let you do that!
charaepi_ch0196_00_fleurdelis/2301_0402_: Oh, really? So you’ll try to stop me?
charaepi_ch0196_00_fleurdelis/2301_1201_:
How beautiful. Forming a sync pair is a way for
people to share their heart and soul with their
partner Pokémon.

If only the whole world were full of sync pairs
like you...

Unfortunately for you, that’s not the case. 
If you stand in my way, I just have to defeat
you first!

You are a symbol of hope, but at the same time,
you are equally a symbol of despair.

The stronger that light of hope shines, the stronger
the despair when it fades into nothing, no?

Will you become our hope? Or will I bring about 
our despair?

Yveltal and I, who share the same ideal of
destruction, will see which prevails!

That’s assuming, of course, we someday have a
chance to battle each other for our ideals.

While I deeply dislike the idea of you getting in my
way, I must say...

I also have some hope that you’ll be able to bring
about the ideal world that I want.

Let us battle someday so that the world can make
its choice. Then we shall have an answer.
